name: com.netkasystem.netkacommitment
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.
author: Apache Cordova Team

cordova-plugin-geolocation.GEOLOCATION_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Netka Commitment requires constant access to your location.

cordova-plugin-ios-camera-permissions.PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Netka Commitment would like to access the library.
